feePercent().details: Returns current fee percent. It has 2 decimal places. e.g. value 1337 has to be interpreted as 13.37%

owner().details: Tells the address of the owner

setFeePercent(uint256).details: Sets current fee percent. It has 2 decimal places. e.g. value 1337 has to be interpreted as 13.37%

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: the address to transfer ownership to.
